Module Schema

SIMBA Module Configuration

The schema describes the configuration file provided to the module.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NSSAC/SIMBA_driver/schema/module.json

type

object

properties

  • mode

Mode

The mode of execution of the module.

type

string

enum

start, step, end

  • lastExecutedTick

Last Executed Tick

The last executed tick (not provided for mode: start).

type

number

multipleOf

1

  • lastExecutedTime

Last Executed Date Time

The last executed date time in ISO format (not provided for mode: start).

type

string

format

date-time

  • currentTick

Current Tick

The current tick.

type

number

multipleOf

1

  • currentTime

Current Date Time

The current date time in ISO format.

type

string

format

date-time

  • targetTick

Target Tick

The target tick (not provided for mode: end).

type

number

multipleOf

1

  • targetTime

Target Date Time

The target date time in ISO format (not provided for mode: end).

type

string

format

date-time
